conversation_flow.content: Request to test memory lifecycle management and complete 3-tier system validation

Created comprehensive test-memory-lifecycle.js script with 5 phases: pre-cleanup analysis, session dump lifecycle analysis, AICF file analysis, memory lifecycle processing, and post-cleanup statistics
Executed memory lifecycle test successfully - compressed 62 entries across 4 AICF files, saved 5,453 tokens, protected critical sessions
Identified inconsistent session dumping behavior - natural flow too unpredictable, needs cleanup and more consistent triggering

technical_context.primary_focus: Memory lifecycle management testing and system validation

decisions_made.rationale: Successfully compressed old entries while preserving critical context
decisions_made.impact: Prevents token bloat in AICF files

decisions_made.rationale: All components tested and validated working together
decisions_made.impact: Hybrid system balances completeness with efficiency

decisions_made.rationale: User feedback indicates natural flow too unpredictable
decisions_made.impact: Must implement more reliable session boundary detection

insights: Memory lifecycle compression is highly effective - saved 37% of AICF tokens
Session dumping inconsistency affects user experience and system reliability
Need deterministic triggers rather than heuristic-based detection
next_steps: Clean up inconsistent session dumping behavior
Implement more predictable session boundary detection
Consider explicit session dump triggers or time-based intervals
Review checkpoint orchestrator logic for reliability improvements
